name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify Email Template Exporter by UpOrder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate setting email templates live from UpOrder to Shopify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you want to save time setting your email templates live, then this Chrome Extension is for you. 

With one click, you can automatically set all of your email templates live in Shopify once you've designed them in UpOrder, instead of manually copy-and-pasting each email template for 27+ email notifications. 

This will save you time so you can worry about things that matter â€“ making sales and growing your business. 

You can find the app in the Shopify App Store here: https://apps.shopify.com/uporder
